item.title: Kasper add a quote by Warren Ellis
item.description: "Drinking is fun! It makes me feel horrible and sexy!" -- Warren Ellis

item.title: Kasper add a quote by Winston S. Churchill
item.description: "It is a good thing for an uneducated man to read books of quotations." -- Winston S. Churchill

item.title: Kasper add a quote by Hisham Matar
item.description: "Grief loves the hollow; all it wants is to hear its own echo." -- Hisham Matar

item.title: Kasper add a quote by G.K. Chesterton
item.description: "Drink because you are happy, but never because you are miserable." -- G.K. Chesterton

item.title: Kasper add a quote by P. J. O'Rourke
item.description: "There are a number of mechanical devices which increase sexual arousal, particularly in women. Chief among these is the Mercedes-Benz 380SL convertible." -- P. J. O'Rourke

item.title: Kasper add a quote by Charles Bukowski
item.description: "I went to the worst of bars hoping to get killed but all I could do was to get drunk again." -- Charles Bukowski

item.title: Kasper add a quote by David Sedaris
item.description: "We were not a hugging people. In terms of emotional comfort it was our belief that no amount of physical contact could match the healing powers of a well made cocktail." -- David Sedaris

item.title: Kasper add a quote by Winston S. Churchill
item.description: "Personally, I'm always ready to learn, although I do not always like being taught." -- Winston S. Churchill

item.title: Kasper add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "If we knew what it was we were doing, it would not be called research, would it?" -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Kasper add a quote by W.C. Fields
item.description: "I cook with wine, sometimes I even add it to the food." -- W.C. Fields

item.title: Kasper add a quote by Groucho Marx
item.description: "The secret of life is honesty and fair dealing. If you can fake that, you've got it made." -- Groucho Marx

item.title: Kasper add a quote by F. Scott Fitzgerald
item.description: "First you take a drink, then the drink takes a drink, then the drink takes you." -- F. Scott Fitzgerald

item.title: Kasper add a quote by Groucho Marx
item.description: "Outside of a dog, a book is man's best friend. Inside of a dog it's too dark to read." -- Groucho Marx

item.title: Kasper add a quote by Milan Kundera
item.description: "isn't beer the holy libation of sincerity? the potion that dispels all hypocrisy, any charade of fine manners? the drink that does nothing worse than incite its fans to urinate in all innocence, to gain weight in all frankness?" -- Milan Kundera

item.title: Kasper add a quote by Groucho Marx
item.description: "A man is only as old as the woman he feels." -- Groucho Marx

item.title: Kasper add a quote by Italo Calvino
item.description: "With the smell of beer I try to get the smell of death off me. And only the smell of death will get the smell of beer off you, like all the drinkers whose graves I have to dig." -- Italo Calvino

item.title: Kasper add a quote by Allen Saunders
item.description: "Life is what happens to you while you're busy making other plans." -- Allen Saunders

item.title: Kasper add a quote by William Shakespeare
item.description: "For a quart of Ale is a dish for a king." -- William Shakespeare

item.title: Kasper add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "I am enough of an artist to draw freely upon my imagination. Imagination is more important than knowledge. Knowledge is limited. Imagination encircles the world." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Kasper add a quote by Sid Vicious
item.description: "I've only been in love with a beer bottle and a mirror." -- Sid Vicious

item.title: Kasper add a quote by Stephen Fry
item.description: "If I had a large amount of money I should certainly found a hospital for those whose grip upon the world is so tenuous that they can be severely offended by words and phrases and yet remain all unoffended by the injustice, violence and oppression that howls daily about our ears." -- Stephen Fry

item.title: Kasper add a quote by P. J. O'Rourke
item.description: "You know your children are growing up when they stop asking you where they came from and refuse to tell you where they're going." -- P. J. O'Rourke

item.title: Kasper add a quote by P. J. O'Rourke
item.description: "Never fight an inanimate object." -- P. J. O'Rourke

item.title: Kasper add a quote by P. J. O'Rourke
item.description: "The Clinton administration launched an attack on people in Texas because those people were religious nuts with guns. Hell, this country was founded by religious nuts with guns. Who does Bill Clinton think stepped ashore on Plymouth Rock?" -- P. J. O'Rourke

item.title: Kasper add a quote by W. C. Fields
item.description: "I always keep some whiskey handy in case I see a snake...which I also keep handy." -- W. C. Fields

item.title: Kasper add a quote by W.C. Fields
item.description: "Fell in love with a beautiful blonde once. Drove me to drink. And I never had the decency to thank her." -- W.C. Fields

item.title: Kasper add a quote by Mae West
item.description: "One more drink and I'll be under the host." -- Mae West

item.title: Kasper add a quote by Winston S. Churchill
item.description: "The best argument against democracy is a five-minute conversation with the average voter." -- Winston S. Churchill

item.title: Kasper add a quote by Winston S. Churchill
item.description:
"He has all the virtues I dislike and none of the vices I admire."
<a href="http://www.winston-churchill-leadership.com/churchill-quote-others.html">[On British Labour politician Stafford Cripps.]</a>" -- Winston S. Churchill

item.title: Kasper add a quote by Winston S. Churchill
item.description: "Success is stumbling from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm." -- Winston S. Churchill
